name: Twilight Marauders
tooltip:
Twilight MaraudersLevel 60

Slay Twilight Marauder Morna and 5 Twilight Marauders.  Report to Windcaller Proudhorn when your task is finished.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing IX in order to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Twilight Marauder Morna
- Twilight Marauder x 5
